meanings.definition: Of or relating to the Roman Catholic Church.
meanings.sent1: The church had a popish ceremony on Sunday.
meanings.sent2: The popish traditions were followed during the service.
meanings.sent3: The popish choir sang with great enthusiasm.
meanings.sent4: Her dress had a popish elegance to it.
meanings.sent5: The popish artwork in the cathedral was breathtaking.

meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of the Pope or the papacy.
meanings.sent1: The painting had a popish aura around it.
meanings.sent2: The room was decorated with popish symbols.
meanings.sent3: He wore a popish hat as a joke.
meanings.sent4: The building had a popish grandeur to it.
meanings.sent5: The popish influence was evident in the architecture.
